projects.title: RockReveal AI
projects.description: Image classification deployed as a Telegram bot. Integrated Weights & Biases for experiment & artifact tracking and a simple MLOps workflow for continuous improvements.

projects.title: Automatic License Plate Recognition (ALPR)
projects.description: High-accuracy ALPR system with end-to-end pipeline and a Streamlit web app for demo and deployment.

projects.title: Real-Time Liveliness Detection
projects.description: Anti-spoofing pipeline (MTCNN + FaceNet) optimized for low-latency deployment on AWS with pruning/quantization applied.

projects.title: Covid-19 X-ray Analysis
projects.description: Real-time deep learning classifier for X-ray images, with notebooks and deployment tooling for evaluation and demo.

projects.title: Agentic Data Analysis (Google ADK)
projects.description: Autonomous data-analysis agents that automate EDA, visualization, and report generation â€” implemented as a folder inside Data-Science-Projects.

projects.title: PDF2Podcast
projects.description: Extracts text from PDFs and converts to podcast-style audio using TTS + summarization, with demo scripts and deployment notes inside the parent repo.

projects.title: Other ML / DS Projects
projects.description: Collection of notebooks and demos covering model prototyping, data pipelines, visualizations and small utilities.
